toolTypes.name: JDKCompatibleVerifyTool
toolTypes.description: A verify tool to check the jdk compatible

toolTypes.name: VersionConventionVerifyTool
toolTypes.description: A verify tool to check the version convention

toolTypes.name: SimpleJenkinsVerifyTool
toolTypes.description: A verify tool based on Jenkins to specify a job id

toolTypes.name: TemplateJenkinsVerifyTool
toolTypes.description: A verify tool based on Jenkins to specify a job config template

toolTypes.name: ScriptJenkinsVerifyTool
toolTypes.description: A verify tool based on Jenkins to specify a job config template with scripts

885db751-6d7f-4682-a9dc-431b2b3e5db8.name: Test_FailureJenkinsJob
885db751-6d7f-4682-a9dc-431b2b3e5db8.description: This Jenkins job will fail after 20 seconds

7ad56ecf-dbe5-42e3-a508-b7d853e361c5.name: Test_SuccessJenkinsJob
7ad56ecf-dbe5-42e3-a508-b7d853e361c5.description: This Jenkins job will succeed after 20 seconds.

7bd1865f-21fd-4ef3-abc9-7dd271667efa.name: Test_TemplateJenkinsJob
7bd1865f-21fd-4ef3-abc9-7dd271667efa.description:
This is a template Jenkins job, will execute just like what the 'GoodJob' does.

If the optional jobId is not set, it will be created automatically by execution framework.

It will override existed job if any
7bd1865f-21fd-4ef3-abc9-7dd271667efa.jenkinsConfigXML:
<project>
<actions/>
<description>This will be Good</description>
<keepDependencies>false</keepDependencies>
<properties/>
<scm class="hudson.scm.NullSCM"/>
<canRoam>true</canRoam>
<disabled>false</disabled>
<blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>
<blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>
<triggers/>
<concurrentBuild>false</concurrentBuild>
<builders>
<hudson.tasks.Shell>
<command>sleep 20; echo -e "wake up"</command>
</hudson.tasks.Shell>
</builders>
<publishers/>
<buildWrappers/>
</project>

e44990e5-454b-49c2-870e-963c4015d384.name: Test_ScriptJenkinsJob
e44990e5-454b-49c2-870e-963c4015d384.description:
This is a Script based Jenkins verify tool. 

It supports bash shell.
e44990e5-454b-49c2-870e-963c4015d384.jenkinsConfigXML:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<project>
  <actions/>
  <description></description>
  <keepDependencies>false</keepDependencies>
  <properties/>
  <scm class="hudson.scm.NullSCM"/>
  <canRoam>true</canRoam>
  <disabled>false</disabled>
  <blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>
  <blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>
  <triggers/>
  <concurrentBuild>true</concurrentBuild>
  <builders>
    <hudson.tasks.Shell>
      <command>
        echo -e "Current product name: $CURRENT_PRODUCT_NAME"
echo -e "Current release name: $CURRENT_RELEASE_NAME"
echo -e "Current zip url: $CURRENT_ZIP_URL"

mkdir -p output
echo -e "This is a plain text log" > output/log.txt
      </command>
    </hudson.tasks.Shell>
  </builders>
  <publishers>
  <hudson.tasks.ArtifactArchiver>
    <artifacts>output/*</artifacts>
    <allowEmptyArchive>true</allowEmptyArchive>
    <onlyIfSuccessful>false</onlyIfSuccessful>
    <fingerprint>false</fingerprint>
    <defaultExcludes>true</defaultExcludes>
</hudson.tasks.ArtifactArchiver>
</publishers>
  <buildWrappers>
    <hudson.plugins.ws__cleanup.PreBuildCleanup plugin="ws-cleanup@0.26">
      <deleteDirs>false</deleteDirs>
      <cleanupParameter/>
      <externalDelete/>
    </hudson.plugins.ws__cleanup.PreBuildCleanup>
  </buildWrappers>
</project>
e44990e5-454b-49c2-870e-963c4015d384.script:
echo -e "Current product name: $CURRENT_PRODUCT_NAME"
echo -e "Current release name: $CURRENT_RELEASE_NAME"
echo -e "Current zip url: $CURRENT_ZIP_URL"

mkdir -p output
echo -e "This is a plain text log" > output/log.txt

a4d685cf-04a9-499d-9097-426106721233.name: zip-diff
a4d685cf-04a9-499d-9097-426106721233.description: The demo zip-diff tool used to run zip difference for 2 zip files
a4d685cf-04a9-499d-9097-426106721233.jenkinsConfigXML:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<project>
  <actions/>
  <description></description>
  <keepDependencies>false</keepDependencies>
  <properties/>
  <scm class="hudson.scm.NullSCM"/>
  <canRoam>true</canRoam>
  <disabled>false</disabled>
  <blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>
  <blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>
  <triggers/>
  <concurrentBuild>true</concurrentBuild>
  <builders>
    <hudson.tasks.Shell>
      <command>
        # download dist-diff tool
wget -O dist-diff.jar http://10.66.79.92/dist-diff2-jar-with-dependencies.jar

# download zip 1 and unzip it
wget -O current.zip ${CURRENT_ZIP_URL}
unzip -q -d current current.zip

# download zip 2 and unzip it
wget -O previous.zip ${REF_ZIP_URL}
unzip -q -d previous previous.zip

java -Xmx2048m -Xms256m -jar dist-diff.jar -a current -b previous -i
      </command>
    </hudson.tasks.Shell>
  </builders>
  <publishers>
  <hudson.tasks.ArtifactArchiver>
    <artifacts>output/*</artifacts>
    <allowEmptyArchive>true</allowEmptyArchive>
    <onlyIfSuccessful>false</onlyIfSuccessful>
    <fingerprint>false</fingerprint>
    <defaultExcludes>true</defaultExcludes>
</hudson.tasks.ArtifactArchiver>
</publishers>
  <buildWrappers>
    <hudson.plugins.ws__cleanup.PreBuildCleanup plugin="ws-cleanup@0.26">
      <deleteDirs>false</deleteDirs>
      <cleanupParameter/>
      <externalDelete/>
    </hudson.plugins.ws__cleanup.PreBuildCleanup>
  </buildWrappers>
</project>
a4d685cf-04a9-499d-9097-426106721233.script:
# download dist-diff tool
wget -O dist-diff.jar http://10.66.79.92/dist-diff2-jar-with-dependencies.jar

# download zip 1 and unzip it
wget -O current.zip ${CURRENT_ZIP_URL}
unzip -q -d current current.zip

# download zip 2 and unzip it
wget -O previous.zip ${REF_ZIP_URL}
unzip -q -d previous previous.zip

java -Xmx2048m -Xms256m -jar dist-diff.jar -a current -b previous -i

dc75a16a-567c-4acf-8752-c6a815a7b45e.name: wolf-validator
dc75a16a-567c-4acf-8752-c6a815a7b45e.description: Wolf-validator is a tool used to validate the internal consistency of a maven artifact repository. It can also be used for validation of the associated distribution directory.
dc75a16a-567c-4acf-8752-c6a815a7b45e.jenkinsConfigXML:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<project>
  <actions/>
  <description></description>
  <keepDependencies>false</keepDependencies>
  <properties/>
  <scm class="hudson.scm.NullSCM"/>
  <canRoam>true</canRoam>
  <disabled>false</disabled>
  <blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenDownstreamBuilding>
  <blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>false</blockBuildWhenUpstreamBuilding>
  <triggers/>
  <concurrentBuild>true</concurrentBuild>
  <builders>
    <hudson.tasks.Shell>
      <command>
        # download wolf-validator tool
wget http://10.66.79.92/wolf-validator.zip
unzip -q wolf-validator.zip

# download zip 1 and unzip it
wget -O current.zip ${CURRENT_MVN_REPO_URL}
unzip -q -d current current.zip

cd wolf-validator-0.1.0
./wolf-validator -vr ../current
      </command>
    </hudson.tasks.Shell>
  </builders>
  <publishers>
  <hudson.tasks.ArtifactArchiver>
    <artifacts>wolf-validator-0.1.0/workspace/log.txt</artifacts>
    <allowEmptyArchive>true</allowEmptyArchive>
    <onlyIfSuccessful>false</onlyIfSuccessful>
    <fingerprint>false</fingerprint>
    <defaultExcludes>true</defaultExcludes>
</hudson.tasks.ArtifactArchiver>
</publishers>
  <buildWrappers>
    <hudson.plugins.ws__cleanup.PreBuildCleanup plugin="ws-cleanup@0.26">
      <deleteDirs>false</deleteDirs>
      <cleanupParameter/>
      <externalDelete/>
    </hudson.plugins.ws__cleanup.PreBuildCleanup>
  </buildWrappers>
</project>
dc75a16a-567c-4acf-8752-c6a815a7b45e.script:
# download wolf-validator tool
wget http://10.66.79.92/wolf-validator.zip
unzip -q wolf-validator.zip

# download zip 1 and unzip it
wget -O current.zip ${CURRENT_MVN_REPO_URL}
unzip -q -d current current.zip

cd wolf-validator-0.1.0
./wolf-validator -vr ../current
